alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 4:25PM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In New York, Herkimer, Hamilton, Eastern Rensselaer and Eastern Columbia Counties. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur in higher terrain areas, and along north and west facing slopes.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer; Western Rensselaer
